body:
Hello, I am proud to announce that my 8 month ban has been appealed, and to celebrate I would like to invite players of Avicus to join Nitwit Gaming (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQgJGvElOcLKltAuK5DIW_Q) in a video on Avicus. To ensure I don't get banned again for "hacking" I will record every time I play as proof. 
If You wish to join us on a video Taking place in the next week.
Reply Saying Your Skype Name, Age, Your own rate on your jokes 1-10 10 being HILARIOUS.
